comment.author: 67195258@N05
comment._content: Love this photo! It reminds me of when I was a camper at Little Eden.  Plus it was only a year ago that I was a counselor in charge of boating with the campers.  It took me a while to place this photo, but the reeds give it away, its amazing to see how this  pic compares with how it is today....so similar yet such a different time.

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comment!  I think there's an excellent history thesis to be written about Mennonite camps and their role in promoting Mennonite culture and values.  I'm just sayin'....
